author: Mahita Gajanan
title: How to Help — Or Get Help — in the Coronavirus Pandemic
description: The COVID-19 pandemic has killed more than 18,000 people and infected over 400,000 globally, forced the closure of schools and businesses, and sent health care workers scrambling for supplies to treat a rise in sick people. The U.S. has more than 60,000 cases…
content:
The COVID-19 pandemic has killed more than 18,000 people and infected over 400,000 globally, forced the closure of schools and businesses, and sent health care workers scrambling for supplies to treat a rise in sick people.
